nodes.text: Executor Executes was a painting that depicted the Super Star Destroyer Executor leading eight Imperial-class Star Destroyers in an attack on an artificially-ringed planet.

Executor Executes first appeared in "Celestia Galactica Photografica," a collection of in-universe illustrations by Ryan Church collected in Star Wars: Visionaries, a graphic novel edited by Jeremy Barlow and released on April 2, 2005.
